p:
TP was corrected as is common practice with the following equation:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$${\text{TP}} = 2 + \frac{{\left( {\delta^{15} {\text{N}}_{ants} - \delta^{15} {\text{N}}_{base} } \right)}}{3.4}$$\end{document}
TP = 2 +
δ 15
N
ants
-
δ 15
N
base
3.4
where 2 is the baseline TP
33 , δ 15N ant is the L. humile isotope value, δ 15N base is the baseline mean δ 15N, and 3.4 represents the fractionation between trophic levels
33 .
